summary: A possible fix to the infinite loading screen.
descriptionHtml:
After a full two months of completely modding my Skyrim to make it perfect, I was forced to re-install the game 5 times. Why? Because I continued to get the dreaded Infinite load screen, ctd, and freezing. Even after checking all 200 of my mods for compatibility and cleaning.

I have reduced my mods since then from 200 to 70. Still no change.
Until***** FIX

I decided to randomly take off/unplug the three \"HighResTexturePack.esp\"
I then started Skyrim and attempted to load my unloadable game.
NO INFINITE LOADING :D

note- My guess is that conflicting texture packs or the memory that is taken up so quickly keeps large areas from being loaded properly.
author: EchoSiren
